Pre-Game Insights: The Yankees and Dodgers are back in the World Series for the first time since 2009.
The Yankees won the AL East, while the Dodgers won the NL West.
Probable Pitchers: RHP Gerrit Cole (NYY) vs. RHP Jack Flaherty (LAD)
World Series storylines: The Yankees are looking to end a 15-year World Series drought.
The Dodgers are aiming to finish the job and secure their fourth World Series title since 2017.
